火 : 爆炸 (直傷)

電 : 觸電 (招忍耐力)

replies.msg:
This is JJF. My main team now is storm blade, buck, tree, light flashwing. I have about 20w power when complete the tower 50, here are some hints:

Need strong healer, flashwing may work too, but your tank may melt fast with just one HP regen, (light has shield and single HP regen, better protection)

Tank need a little bit high resistance, you do not want to see hit by boss with def down debuff.. I use tree, with high resistance and purify enchant

Need silencer, definitely cannot let boss use charge skill, everything will be wiped out. This one is most important, I use stormblade for silence, sprocket may be another option, silence+ heal

Try to kill monsters on two side first rather than boss. The def down debuff is pretty annoying. Kill them first will increase the chance to survive and win. But the boss has taunt most of time, some aoe maybe good choice.

Extra skill with knowdown will increase chance to survive. Watch out boss endurance, some time knowdown can save you from missing silence. Love the stormblade, has almost all the functions, AOE, silence, knowdown.

Use George, save the shield. Sometime this shield will save you if you miss silence, or help you survive until your healer CD ready.

Try more times, if you feels that need some luck to pass, otherwise everything is ok, try more time you will make it. The skill stone reward is huge improvement for the early game.

https://forum.gamer.com.tw/C.php?bsn=34490&snA=54&tnum=2
大家好像對這個話題很有興趣，拋磚引玉渣翻一下，歡迎大家一起討論。

原PO破關時的隊伍戰鬥力是20萬，成員是: 颶鋒鳥人(風-傳說)、三箭弓夏特(魔法-傳說)、巨樹雷克斯(生命-英雄)、螢翼偉恩(光-英雄)

以下原文：
Need strong healer, flashwing may work too, but your tank may melt fast with just one HP regen, (light has shield and single HP regen, better protection)
簡單翻譯：要有強力補師，地屬的螢翼偉恩原PO認為或許可行但保護功能相對不足。(光屬有護盾&單補)

Tank need a little bit high resistance, you do not want to see hit by boss with def down debuff.. I use tree, with high resistance and purify enchant
簡單翻譯：王會上扣防debuff，所以坦克要稱效果抵抗。(原PO的坦克是巨樹+淨化套裝)

Need silencer, definitely cannot let boss use charge skill, everything will be wiped out. This one is most important, I use stormblade for silence, sprocket may be another option, silence+ heal
簡單翻譯：沉默技能很重要(原PO認為最重要的一點)，不能讓BOSS放出集中技能，原PO使用颶鋒鳥人沉默BOSS，並認為扳手凱特或許是另一個選擇(機器-英雄，有沉默&補血)。

Try to kill monsters on two side first rather than boss. The def down debuff is pretty annoying. Kill them first will increase the chance to survive and win. But the boss has taunt most of time, some aoe maybe good choice.
簡單翻譯：BOSS旁小怪先殺可以增加通關機率，因為他們會放扣防的debuff。另外，大部分的BOSS都有嘲諷技能，所以隊伍配置一些範圍技能是不錯的。

Extra skill with knowdown will increase chance to survive. Watch out boss endurance, some time knowdown can save you from missing silence. Love the stormblade, has almost all the functions, AOE, silence, knowdown.
簡單翻譯：盡量配置多一點能讓對手進入無防備狀態的技能，留意BOSS的忍耐值，如果沉默被抵抗了，可以用無防備讓BOSS進入無法行動狀態來補救(颶鋒鳥人功能性真的強，有AOE、沉默、無防備)

Use George, save the shield. Sometime this shield will save you if you miss silence, or help you survive until your healer CD ready.
簡單翻譯：力量大師用喬治(護盾那個)，在沉默沒上到或是補還在CD時可以放護盾保護。

Try more times, if you feels that need some luck to pass, otherwise everything is ok, try more time you will make it. The skill stone reward is huge improvement for the early game.
簡單翻譯：RNG遊戲，多試幾次就過關(但前提也是戰鬥力要到門檻)
以上渣翻，如有錯誤歡迎指正，下面一點個人想法。

1.留意原PO的隊伍配置和打法時也要注意一下戰鬥力，如果練度不夠靠打法和組合應該也救不回來(廢話XD)
2.值得注意的是原PO還是以傳說、英雄級做為隊伍成員，我認為版上提出先練低稀有度的怪獸這個思路還是有其道理在的，怎麼抉擇就看個人了(另外部分幻影塔層數的三星條件有要求英雄以下，先練了也不需要太後悔)
